member.name: T:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.IL2CppExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for safe IL2CPP object manipulation Uses Il2CppInterop for proper IL2CPP support in BepInEx 6.x

member.summary: Safely get a member value from an IL2CPP object

member.summary: Safely set a member value on an IL2CPP object

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.IL2CppExtensions.InvokeMethod(System.Object,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Safely invoke a void method on an IL2CPP object
member.returns: True if method was found and invoked successfully, false otherwise

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.IL2CppExtensions.InvokeMethod``1(System.Object,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Safely invoke a method on an IL2CPP object with return value

member.summary: Safe invoke with fallback for IL2CPP objects

member.summary: Get the IL2CPP type of an object

member.summary: Convert values safely between IL2CPP and managed types

member.summary: Alias for GetMemberValue - specifically for field access

member.summary: Alias for SetMemberValue - specifically for property access

member.name: T:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers
member.summary: Reflection helpers for IL2CPP environments Centralizes type discovery functions for decompiled assemblies CORRECTED: Removed duplicated extension methods (use IL2CPP native extensions instead)

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.FindType(System.String)
member.summary: Finds a type by name across all loaded assemblies OPTIMIZED: Uses TypeDiscoveryCache via reflection to avoid circular dependency

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.TryUseCachedDiscovery(System.String)
member.summary: Try to use TypeDiscoveryCache via reflection to avoid circular dependency

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.FindTypeSlowFallback(System.String)
member.summary: Original slow type discovery method (fallback only)

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.FindTypes(System.Func{System.Type,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Finds all types matching the given predicate

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.TypeExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a type exists without throwing exceptions

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.GetTypesInNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all types in a specific namespace

member.name: M:PerAspera.Core.IL2CPP.ReflectionHelpers.GetDerivedTypes(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all types that inherit from a specific base type

member.summary: Safe method invocation with error handling
member.returns: Method result or null if failed

member.summary: Safe field/property access
